rows.label: bf08220100_0010
rows.name: Laura!

rows.label: bf08220100_0020
rows.name:
Find them!
They must be somewhere nearby!

rows.label: bf08220100_0030
rows.name: Laura...

rows.label: bf08220100_0040
rows.name: Don't worry...

rows.label: bf08220100_0050
rows.name: If I die, you'll just go to sleep...

rows.label: bf08220100_0060
rows.name:
...Someone will find you...
...reawaken you...someday...

rows.label: bf08220100_0070
rows.name:
For us humans...
Being forgotten is a much worse fate than death.

rows.label: bf08220100_0080
rows.name:
We struggle...so hard to make our
mark...on the world...

rows.label: bf08220100_0090
rows.name: Laura!

rows.label: bf08220100_0100
rows.name:
...When you awaken...
...You will have forgotten everything about me...

rows.label: bf08220100_0110
rows.name: Shin...

rows.label: bf08220100_0112
rows.name: the thought of you forgetting me...

rows.label: bf08220100_0115
rows.name: of this bond disappearing...is so lonely...

rows.label: bf08220100_0120
rows.name:
I won't forget you!
I refuse to forget you!

rows.label: bf08220100_0130
rows.name: How could...I ever...

rows.label: bf08220100_0140
rows.name: I knew this would happen some day...

rows.label: bf08220100_0142
rows.name: But now the time has come, I'm hopeless...

rows.label: bf08220100_0150
rows.name: I'm so sorry to do this to you...

rows.label: bf08220100_0160
rows.name: There is one way... One final chance...

rows.label: bf08220100_0170
rows.name: A way that we can be together...

rows.label: bf08220100_0180
rows.name: Ugh... Hroarrrggggghhh!
